description: This spacious apartment (1050 sqft) located at the neighborhood of Bushwick in Brooklyn, a great neighborhood with a lot of cultures and histories. The location is great, only 3-5 mins walk to the Subway Station (J&Z Train-Brooklyn "Gates Ave."), about 15-20 mins to lower Manhattan. Surrounded with many restaurants, grocery stores, supermarkets and shopping malls. A good choice for a short trip to explore New York City and experience the tremendous artistic temperament of Brooklyn.
name: Newly Renovated 2 bedroom apartment in Brooklyn
review: Enjoyed our stay. William was great at reaching out and was very flexible. Place is cleanly, spacious and well-located. A good deal for a quick trip to the city. Thanks!
